channel.title: Testing on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on PR

item.title: The bug that *still* haunts me
item.description: My recent project was to build an html5 app on top of Salesforce1. As usual after the development is complete we send it to QA for approval.

item.title: Book Recommendation: Testing with coffeescript by Jack Franklin [Free ebook]
item.description: TDD (Test Driven Development) was introduced to me around 2006 with PHPUnit. As a naive, I couldn’t see the benefits, eg.

item.title: Laptop Cooling Pad & Sudden Motion Sensor
item.description: Finally I found a good usecase to test the Sudden Motion Sensor of my macbook pro. I was curious to know whether there is an impact of cooling pad’s fan.

item.title: Distribute your iPhone/iPad adhoc builds Over The Air using Dropbox
item.description: Update: I recently found this site called diawi.com which allows you to distribute the app similar to file-sharing sites, drag and drop ipa file and share the link to the testers.
